message: Let's start fair. I'll take the lion's share this round, but we can work out a more balanced agreement later.
That's not a fair start, Alice.  I'm willing to be generous, but let's make it reasonable. This offer ensures we both benefit significantly.
Okay, Bob. Let's be a bit more reasonable.  This offer gives you a good chunk of the money while still ensuring I get a significant share.  Let's wrap this up.
Alice, this is getting ridiculous. We both lose out the longer this goes on. I'm offering you a fair 45% - let's close this deal and walk away.
